Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
Rectangle
public class Rectangle extends Object
A rectangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
Version:
1.0 (15 July 2000)()
Author:
Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes (Modified)

  • Method Details

    • mirror

      public void mirror()

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      Make this rectangle visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.

    • makeInvisible

      public void makeInvisible()
      Make this rectangle invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels to the right.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels to the left.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels up.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels down.

    • moveHorizontal

      public void moveHorizontal(int distance)
      Move the rectangle horizontally.
      Parameters:
      distance - the desired distance in pixels

    • moveVertical

      public void moveVertical(int distance)
      Move the rectangle vertically.
      Parameters:
      distance - the desired distance in pixels

    • slowMoveHorizontal

      public void slowMoveHorizontal(int distance)
      Slowly move the rectangle horizontally.
      Parameters:
      distance - the desired distance in pixels

    • slowMoveVertical

      public void slowMoveVertical(int distance)
      Slowly move the rectangle vertically.
      Parameters:
      distance - the desired distance in pixels

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newHeight, int newWidth)
      Change the size to the new size
      Parameters:
      newHeight - the new height in pixels. newHeight must be >=0.
      newWidht - the new width in pixels. newWidth must be >=0.

    • zoom

      public void zoom(char z)
      Change the size in a 100% keeping the proportion.
      Parameters:
      z - it determines if the size increases or decreaces.

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(String newColor)
      Change the color.
      Parameters:
      color - the new color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta" and "black".

    • walk

      public void walk(int times)
      Move the rectangle in n times
      Parameters:
      int - times in the canvas
